page.title: 17Claire - Panfield Princess
page.content: On 13th July 1985 I went to the {Panfield Community Centre.}My sister Tara and I were entering the{Panfield {Princess Competition,}for girls under 16. About ten girls took part. The judges were three American ladies. We took part in a parade. I wore a white, lace-trimmed dress which we bought in{Chelmsford.}We were each asked what we like doing best. Tara and Lucy, my friend, were too shy to say anything. I was very excited when the judges chose me! A tiara was put on my head and many photographs were taken. On 20th July I went to a football rally. I gave trophies to the winners. Each man kissed me _ I hated it! On 17th August I was officially crowned by our{M.P., Tony Newton.}Lastly I will take part in the{Braintree {Carnival}in 1986.
